channel.title: Project Best Scape Dev Team
channel.description:
Hello, this is Djmeadows88 from Project Best Scape which is in hope to be a great server with great staff and mods/admins aswell as a friendly community and players!
[u][b]Project:[/b][/u] D Claws with working specs Godswords working specs Webclient 614 server Custom items Possible Quests Working Capes [u][b]ALL SKILLS[/b][/u] Pest Control Wilderness Working GE
[u][b]What We are looking for![/b][/u]
-Coder(0/2) -Programmer(0/1) -Website Designer(0/1) -Client Developer(0/1)
[u][b]You must reply with the following[/b][/u]
-What position do you want to join?:
-Experience?:
-Will you be active, trustworthy, helpful, and friendly?:
-You must be able to work whenever possible, and keep me updated on what your doing. Can you do this?:
Will you follow all of the rules(See Below) and expectations(See Below of what we want in the server?(Agree or Not Agree):
[u][b]Rules of Project Best Scape Dev Team[/b][/u]
1. Be friendly, active, have respect for others, and do your best
2. Prove to be trust worthy to me and others or else we can let you go without any problems.(if having a bad day please inform everyone)
3. Add everyone to yahoo/msn and keep in contact with everyone.
4. At the least be able to help work 4/7 days of the week(with the exception of work, family, illness, etc...)
5. Be able to have fun and share knowledge with less knowledgeable staff.
6. Send me a report of your progress at least twice a week!
Thank you: David Meadows Yahoo: david_meadows1994@yahoo.com

item.title: Project Best Scape Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I still laugh at the fact this is named “Project Best Scape” ROFL.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Best Scape Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @djmeadows88 djmeadows88
item.description:
@djmeadows88 wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:4, topic:383740”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=479504.msg3510717#msg3510717 date=1298528550]
I don’t think this could be a general idea for members to persuade them to join.
[/quote]

I logged into this, they are a piece of shit.[/quote]

Rash that was with old staff, we got totally new staff now, and the old staff is still causing problems… The messed our webclient up… Removed our website… And everything…

Read full topic

item.title: Project Best Scape Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:7, topic:383740”][quote author=Wintercanon link=topic=479504.msg3514902#msg3514902 date=1298895635]
a more original name, you would attract more intelligent members
[/quote]

Amen Lol; Project Best Scape sounds like it was made by a 12 year old.[/quote]

12 year old with a brian!

Read full topic

item.title: Project Best Scape Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69

@Clawz_fury wrote:

a more original name, you would attract more intelligent members

item.title: Project Best Scape Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

I’m pretty sure if you used a more original name, you would attract more intelligent members to join your development.

Also you should probably define the difference in the ‘coder’ and ‘programmer’ positions. Otherwise good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Best Scape Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

djmeadows88:

sorry im not the best topic starter and what not lol, can you tell me from your view on what would pursuade people?

You could start off with making the thread better and the thread explaining more about the server. Your current small server goals are like the rest of the developments I’ve came across. You should attempt to some how make the server unique, that would make others want to post more applications plus the fact of them knowing on what their dealing with.

You could also post some media to let us know what we’re dealing with as well.

[quote=“Rash, post:4, topic:383740”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=479504.msg3510717#msg3510717 date=1298528550]
I don’t think this could be a general idea for members to persuade them to join.
[/quote]

I logged into this, they are a piece of shit.[/quote]
Well let’s hope he can improve.

Read full topic
